data.prayer: Father, help the 50,753 believers in Azamgarh to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Azamgarh, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Azamgarh unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Azamgarh hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, make the 50,753 believers in Azamgarh to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 4,563,147 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Hela people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Azamgarh, Uttar Pradesh, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Azamgarh. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.section_summary:
the county of Azamgarh, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 4,613,900.

We estimate Azamgarh has 50,753 people who might know Jesus, 55,982 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,507,165 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Azamgarh
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.
